case_name: 著作権持分確認請求事件
contents:
One of the
authors, Yatabe translated all items of Guilford’s thirteen scales into Japanese, and
selected 240 items By this item analysis, Yatabe constructed thirteen scales
which were composed of 12 items each.
One of the authors, Yatabe (16)
translated all items of Guilford's thirteen scales into Japanese, and selected 240
items…
A factorial study of the
temperament of Japanese college males students by the Yatabe-Guilford
Inventory
One of the authors, Yatabe translated all items of Guilford's thirteen scales
into Japanese, and selected 240 items By this item analysis, Yatabe
constructed thirteen scales which were composed of 12 items each.
